content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Design and construction of station at Bukit Panjang and tunnels including three basement levels (concourse, platform and under platform).
  • The 16.6km long Downtown Line Stage 2 comprises one depot and 12 stations, including three interchange stations which will link to the North East Line (NEL), North South Line (NSL) and Circle Line (CCL), giving commuters greater accessibility to the rest of the island and significantly improving travel time.
CLIENT

Land Transport Authority

LOCATION

Bukit Panjang, Singapore

COMPLETION YEAR

2015

AWARDS
  • BCA Construction Productivity Award – Projects (Platinum), 2017
  • BCA Construction Excellence Award, Civil Engineering Projects Category, 2017
  • LTA Excellence Awards 2016 (Best Managed Rail/Road Infrastructure – Project Partner Category)
  • LTA Accident Free Million Man-hours Award 2013
